channel.title: EtsyBlog
channel.description: This awesome blog was created in ruby on rails by Yan_1337. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: Heroku and openshift vs docker and ngrok
item.description:
I have used every framework to deploy my application , and localhost:3000 + ngrok and srvdir is the best option for a linux server.

Etsydemo also offers powerful support for code snippets:

$ rake db:migrate 
  rails server"
end
$git push heroku master
#=> git push origin master

Check out the irc chat for more info on how to get the most out of EtsyDemo. File all bugs/feature requests at irc #DevOps

item.title: Self hosted Ruby on Rails website with github
item.description:
Self hosted auto generated static blog with ruby on rails and node.js

Check out the irc chat for more info on how to get the most out of EtsyDemo. File all bugs/feature requests at irc #DevOps EtsyDemo IRC network on heroku

item.title: Welcome to my first Etsydemo blog!
item.description:
Youâ€™ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Etsydemo also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the irc chat for more info on how to get the most out of EtsyDemo. File all bugs/feature requests at irc #DevOps
